item.title: My IDE Settings
item.description: My settings for Visual Studio Code. Please feel free to use any and all settings you might find useful :) { "editor.fontSize": 17, "editor.fontFamily": "'Jetbrains Mono', 'monospace', monospace, 'Droid Sans Fallback'", "editor.fontLigatures": true, "editor.lineHeight": 25, "editor.letterSpacing": 0.5, "files.trimTrailingWhitespace": true, "editor.cursorStyle": "line", "editor.cursorWidth": 5, "editor.cursorBlinking": "solid", "editor.renderWhitespace": "none", "update.showReleaseNotes": false, "editor.linkedEditing": true, "editor.suggestSelection": "first", "editor.fontWeight": 600, "editor.formatOnSave": true, "git.enableSmartCommit": true, "editor.colorDecorators": false, "git.confirmSync": false, "editor.wordWrap": "on", "editor.wordWrapColumn": 111, "git.allowForcePush": true, "git.confirmForcePush": false, "editor.
